ED_Title: Question of the Comorian island of Mayotte
ED_DecisionText: At its 63rd plenary meeting, on 4 September 2020, the General Assembly decided to include the item entitled “Question of the Comorian island of Mayotte” in the draft agenda of its seventy-fifth session.
ED_Disclaimer: The final version of decisions adopted during the resumed part of the session will be contained in the official record of the GA (A/74/49 (Vol. III)) after editorial review.
